me.tatarka.ipromise

Class Result.ChainPromise<T1,T2,E extends java.lang.Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.tatarka.ipromise.Result.Chain<T1,E,Promise<Result<T2,E>>>
      • me.tatarka.ipromise.Result.ChainPromise<T1,T2,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - the type of the original result success value
    T2 - the type of the new result success value
    E - the error type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Chain<Result<T1,E>,Promise<Result<T2,E>>>
    Enclosing class:
    Result<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>

    public abstract static class Result.ChainPromise<T1,T2,E extends java.lang.Exception>
extends Result.Chain<T1,E,Promise<Result<T2,E>>>
    A listener to use for Promise.then(me.tatarka.ipromise.Chain) that gives you a callback for a successful value.

    Result.Chain
